Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory19.jpg'}
{3: 'The "Iron Maiden" Tifa lightly trailed out of the darkness, a Construct lay unmoving on one of her spikes.'}
{3: 'The Construct was then thrown aside like trash. The body let off a dull thud as it hit the ground, causing a cloud of dust to rise.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "That's... a Cerberus member...?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Hey! Vera, what's the situation on your end? We just saw a corpse of your squad.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'We almost... had her...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'But she had something up her sleeve... Tch!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I\'ll give you one last piece of advice, this "maiden" before you isn\'t of sound mind, beware...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Are you not worried about your squad member?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Just a dead piece of trash. Nothing but himself to blame.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Augh! Al... right, I'll need a little break.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Those reckless fools...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Tifa', 3: 'Overconfidence is a vice.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tifa', 3: 'Humanity will never defeat the Punishing Virus. How much more pain do you need to understand this plain simple fact?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tifa', 3: 'Because of your naivety, this hell was unleashed upon us...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tifa', 3: 'And cost me my... most precious... commandant...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tifa', 3: 'But now, I have the power of the Ascension-Network on my side.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tifa', 3: 'And with this power, I will fulfill the last wish of my commandant...', 4: '1'}
